DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine if Dimebon is safe and effective in patients with mild to moderate Alzheimer's disease on Donepezil.
DOC.brief_title: Safety and Efficacy Study Evaluating Dimebon in Patients With Mild to Moderate Alzheimer's Disease on Donepezil
DOC.criteria: Mildtomoderate Alzheimer's disease (AD) Probable AD (Diagnostic Statistical Manual of Mental DisordersIVText Revision (DSMIVTR)) MiniMental State Examination (MMSE) score between 12 and 24, inclusive Stable on donepezil for at least 6 months Other causes of dementia Major structural brain disease Unstable medical condition or significant hepatic or renal disease
